title: News24.com | ANC Mpumalanga member in a pickle over claims she used food parcels for personal gain
description: An ANC member of the Mpumalanga provincial legislature has been accused of diverting packages to her home, allegedly for patronage and electioneering.
content:
While fears over food parcel shortages mount across the country, an ANC member of the Mpumalanga provincial legislature has been accused of diverting packages to her home, allegedly for patronage and electioneering.
LIVE | All the latest coronavirus and lock… [+4107 chars]
